reporter_caption.center: ARK. DEPT. HEALTH HUMAN SERV. v. SMITH, 06-6 (Ark. 3-15-2007)

caption.center: ARKANSAS DEPARTMENT of HEALTH and HUMAN SERVICES v. Honorable Vann

opinion.posture: Appeal from Pulaski Circuit, Fourteenth Division.
opinion.opinion_text: MOTIONS SUBMITTED Motion to reinstate petition for writ of prohibition, or in the alternative, writ of certiorari, to the active docket of the Supreme Court and to establish a supplemental briefing schedule.Page 4
